reproduce

protected void reproduce(NeatParameters config,
                         Innovations innovations,

                         java.util.List<Organism> offspring,
                         long generationNumber)
Description copied from class: AbstractReproductionOperation
Performs the reproduction operation. The Organisms to be added to the next generation should be addded to the newOffspring List.

Specified by:
reproduce in class AbstractReproductionOperation
Parameters:
config - the NeatParameters that describe the environment for the evolution.
parentChroms - the List of Organisms to reproduce from.
numOffspring - the number of new Organisms to create.
offspring - the List containing the new Offspring. This List should have all new Offspring for the next generation added to it.
